name: Touchpoint Resource
slogan: Matching top talent with top companies across Europe!

team.title: Project Resource Manager
team.name: Kai Ellis
team.bioHtml: Matching top talent with top companies across Europe. We recruit for both permanent and contract positions for Tech Startups and Large Corporates.

jobs.title: Backend Java Developer- Market Leading Ecommerce Business
jobs.description:
Our client is one of the largest European E-commerce businesses and is a market leader in their field, they are looking to expand their business even further and are keen to speak with ambitious individuals who can really help shape and grow their existing Products.

We are looking for talented engineers to join their Engineering Team based in Barcelona and in particular, we need Back-End focused developers with expertise in Java. 

Although a large company, they have maintained their startup feel and work using Agile methodologies.


You will work with a top-notch tech stack, including:

- Java 8
- BigData (Kafka, Cassandra, ElasticSearch, Redis, Neo4j…)
- Docker
- Kubernetes
- Google Cloud

The role offers:

- State of the art offices in a prime location in sunny Barcelona
- Very competitive salary package which includes a relocation bonus (if applicable)
- Access to cutting-edge technologies with a really entrepreneurial vibe
- A truly international workforce from all over the globe, English is the spoken language

Please note, we are only able to consider candidates who already have the right to work in Spain, unfortunately, Visa sponsorship is not possible at this time.

If you are interested in finding out more, please apply with a CV and I will be in contact ASAP to discuss.

jobs.title: Exciting Agile iOS Opportunity (Swift/ Objective C) - Market Leading Ecommerce Business
jobs.description:
Our client is one of the largest European E-commerce businesses and is a market leader in their field, they are looking to expand their business even further and are keen to speak with ambitious individuals who can really help shape and grow their existing products and services.

We are looking for talented iOS Developers to join their team based in Barcelona, and if the thought of working for a market-leading company with millions of customers excites you, please read on!

Required Experience:

- Passion for new technologies and clean architecture.
- +3 years solid experience in iOS mobile application development.
- Experience with both Swift and Objective-C as well as knowledge of CoreData and Unit & UI Testing.
- Know the criteria for designing mobile applications (usability and interaction).
- Have a continuous improvement mentality.
- Have knowledge in other languages or platforms as well as coming from an Agile environment.
- Experience with CocoaPods & Continuous Integration tools as well as with Open Source software.
- Fluent in English is a must as my client have people from over 70 different nationalities!

Although a large company, they have maintained their startup feel and work using Agile methodologies.

The role offers:

- State of the art offices in a prime location in sunny Barcelona
- Very competitive salary package which includes a relocation bonus (if applicable)
- Access to cutting-edge technologies with a really entrepreneurial vibe
- A truly international workforce from all over the globe, English is the spoken language

Please note, we are only able to consider candidates who already have the right to work in Spain, unfortunately, Visa sponsorship is not possible at this time.


If you are interested in finding out more, please apply with a CV and I will be in contact ASAP to discuss.

jobs.title: Frontend Architect (React/Angular/Vue) - Market Leading eCommerce Business
jobs.description:
Our client is one of the largest European E-commerce businesses and is a market leader in their field, they are looking to expand their business even further and are keen to speak with ambitious individuals who can really help shape and grow their existing products and services.

Although a large company, they have maintained their startup feel and work using Agile methodologies.

Our client are in the early stages of migrating their entire frontend architecture and require a senior candidate to help them do so, we are looking for someone who has good hands-on experience with Javascript, React, Angular and Vue.  This position comes with a lot of responsibility and your decisions will ultimately shape the way thousands of people see and use this platform on a daily basis.  


This is an exciting opportunity for someone to bring creative ideas to the table and have a strong influence on how this business moves forward into the future. 


If you are interested in finding out more, please apply with a CV and I will be in contact ASAP to discuss.

jobs.title: Frontend Javascript Developer - Market Leading eCommerce/ Travel Business
jobs.description:
Our client is one of the largest European E-commerce businesses and is a market leader in their field, they are looking to expand their business even further and are keen to speak with ambitious individuals who can really help shape and grow their existing products and services.

Although a large company, they have maintained their startup feel and work using Agile methodologies.

We are building a passionate Frontend team, focused on high-performance applications and require the following experience:


- 3+ years’ professional development experience 
- Expert knowledge of Javascript (ES6) programming language 
- Knowledge of Backend development (Java EE is a bonus!)
- Dynamic, proactive, passionate about Javascript, and willing to evolve in a fast-paced environment
- Good communication skills in English


The role offers:

- State of the art offices in a prime location in sunny Barcelona
- Very competitive salary package which includes a relocation bonus (if applicable)
- Access to cutting-edge technologies with a really entrepreneurial vibe
- A truly international workforce from all over the globe, English is the spoken language

Please note, we are only able to consider candidates who already have the right to work in Spain, unfortunately, Visa sponsorship is not possible at this time.


If you are interested in finding out more, please apply with a CV and I will be in contact ASAP to discuss.
